title: List of further education colleges in Northern Ireland
text:
This is a list of current <a href="further%20education">further education</a> and <a href="higher%20education">higher education</a> colleges in Northern Ireland most of which provide both levels of qualification.
Further education colleges offer courses for people over the age of 14, involving school-level qualifications such as <a href="Higher%20Grade">Higher Grade</a> exams, as well as <a href="work-based%20learning">work-based learning</a> and <a href="apprenticeships">apprenticeships</a>. Higher education colleges also offer <a href="Undergraduate_education%23English%2C_Welsh%2C_and_Northern_Irish_system">undergraduate qualifications</a> and <a href="Postgraduate_education%23United_Kingdom">post-graduate qualifications</a>.
Northern Irish colleges are funded the <a href="Department%20for%20the%20Economy">Department for the Economy</a> (DfE).
